title: Hadith 1: Actions are by Intentions
arabic: إِنَّمَا الأَعْمَالُ بِالنِّيَّاتِ
transliteration: Innamal a’malu bin-niyyati
translation: Actions are judged by intentions.

title: Hadith 2: Islam, Iman, Ihsan
arabic: الإِسْلاَمُ أَنْ تَشْهَدَ أَنْ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ
transliteration: Al-Islam an tashhada an la ilaha illa Allah...
translation: Islam is to testify that there is no god but Allah...

title: Hadith 3: The Pillars of Islam
arabic: بُنِيَ الإِسْلاَمُ عَلَى خَمْسٍ
transliteration: Buniya al-Islamu ‘ala khamsin...
translation: Islam is built upon five (pillars)...

title: Hadith 4: Halal and Haram are Clear
arabic: إِنَّ الْحَلاَلَ بَيِّنٌ وَإِنَّ الْحَرَامَ بَيِّنٌ
transliteration: Inna al-halal bayyin wa inna al-haram bayyin...
translation: The lawful is clear and the unlawful is clear...

title: Hadith 5: Sincerity in Religion
arabic: الدِّينُ النَّصِيحَةُ
transliteration: Ad-deenu an-naseehah
translation: The religion is sincere advice.

title: Hadith 6: The Importance of Knowledge
arabic: طَلَبُ الْعِلْمِ فَرِيضَةٌ عَلَى كُلِّ مُسْلِمٍ
transliteration: Talabul ‘ilmi faridatun ‘ala kulli Muslim...
translation: Seeking knowledge is an obligation upon every Muslim...

title: Hadith 7: The Virtue of the Quran
arabic: خَيْرُكُمْ مَنْ تَعَلَّمَ الْقُرْآنَ وَعَلَّمَهُ
transliteration: Khayrukum man ta’allama al-Qur’an wa ‘allamahu
translation: The best among you are those who learn the Quran and teach it.

title: Hadith 8: The Importance of Prayer
arabic: أَقْرِبُ مَا يَكُونُ الْعَبْدُ مِنْ رَبِّهِ وَهُوَ سَاجِدٌ
transliteration: Aqrabu ma yakoonu al-‘abdu min rabbihi wa huwa sajid...
translation: The closest that a servant comes to his Lord is when he is prostrating.

title: Hadith 9: The Importance of Charity
arabic: مَا نَقَصَتْ صَدَقَةٌ مِنْ مَالٍ
transliteration: Ma naqasat sadaqatun min mal...
translation: Charity does not decrease wealth.

title: Hadith 10: The Importance of Good Character
arabic: إِنَّ مِنْ أَحَبِّكُمْ إِلَىَّ وَأَقْرَبَكُمْ مِنِّي مَجْلِسًا يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ أَحْسَنُكُمْ أَخْلاَقًا
transliteration: Inna min ahabbikum ilayya wa aqrabikum minni majlisan yawmal qiyamati ahsanukum akhlaqan
translation: The most beloved of you to me and the closest of you to me on the Day of Judgment are those with the best character.

title: Hadith 11: The Importance of Family
arabic: خَيْرُكُمْ خَيْرُكُمْ لأَهْلِهِ وَأَنَا خَيْرُكُمْ لأَهْلِي
transliteration: Khayrukum khayrukum li-ahlihi wa ana khayrukum li-ahli
translation: The best of you are the best to their families, and I am the best to my family.

title: Hadith 12: The Importance of Patience
arabic: وَمَنْ يَصْبِرْ يُصْبِرْهُ اللَّهُ
transliteration: wa man yasbir yusbirohullahu
translation: Whoever is patient, Allah will make him patient.

title: Hadith 13: The Importance of Gratitude
arabic: مَنْ لاَ يَشْكُرِ النَّاسَ لاَ يَشْكُرُ اللَّهَ
transliteration: man la yashkurin-nasa la yashkuru-llah
translation: Whoever does not thank people, does not thank Allah.

title: Hadith 14: The Importance of Honesty
arabic: الصِّدْقُ يَهْدِي إِلَى الْبِرِّ وَالْبِرُّ يَهْدِي إِلَى الْجَنَّةِ
transliteration: as-sidqu yahdi ilal birr wal birru yahdi ilal jannah
translation: Honesty leads to righteousness and righteousness leads to Paradise.

title: Hadith 15: The Importance of Modesty
arabic: الْحَيَاءُ لاَ يَأْتِي إِلاَّ بِخَيْرٍ
transliteration: al-hayau la ya'ti illa bi khair
translation: Modesty brings nothing but good.

title: Hadith 16: The Importance of Good Manners
arabic: إِنَّ مِنْ أَحَبِّكُمْ إِلَيَّ وَأَقْرَبِكُمْ مِنِّي مَجْلِسًا يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ أَحْسَنُكُمْ أَخْلاَقًا
transliteration: Inna min ahabbikum ilayya wa aqrabikum minni majlisan yawmal qiyamati ahsanukum akhlaqan
translation: The most beloved of you to me and the closest of you to me on the Day of Judgment are those with the best character.

title: Hadith 17: The Importance of Forgiveness
arabic: مَنْ لاَ يَرْحَمِ النَّاسَ لاَ يَرْحَمْهُ اللَّهُ
transliteration: man laa yarhamin-naas laa yarham-hullaah
translation: Whoever does not show mercy to people, Allah will not show mercy to him.

title: Hadith 18: The Importance of Repentance
arabic: تُوبُوا إِلَى اللَّهِ وَاسْتَغْفِرُوهُ فَإِنِّي أَتُوبُ إِلَيْهِ فِي الْيَوْمِ مِائَةَ مَرَّةٍ
transliteration: Tubu ila Allahi wastaghfiruhu fa inni atubu ilayhi fil yawmi mi'ata marrah
translation: Turn to Allah in repentance and seek His forgiveness, for I turn to Him a hundred times a day.

title: Hadith 19: The Importance of Patience
arabic: عَجَبًا لِأَمْرِ الْمُؤْمِنِ إِنَّ أَمْرَهُ كُلَّهُ خَيْرٌ وَلَيْسَ ذَاكَ لِأَحَدٍ إِلاَّ لِلْمُؤْمِنِ إِنْ أَصَابَتْهُ سَرَّاءُ شَكَرَ فَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَهُ وَإِنْ أَصَابَتْهُ ضَرَّاءُ صَبَرَ فَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَهُ
transliteration: ‘Ajaban li amril mu’min, innamrahu kullahu khair, wa laysa dhalika li ahadin illa lil mu’min, in asabathu sarrashakar fa kana khairan lahu wa in asabathu darrasabara fa kana khairan lahu
translation: How wonderful is the affair of the believer, for his affairs are all good, and this applies to no one but the believer. If something good happens to him, he is thankful for it and that is good for him. If something bad happens to him, he bears it with patience and that is good for him.

title: Hadith 20: The Importance of Brotherhood
arabic: لاَ يُؤْمِنُ أَحَدُكُمْ حَتَّى يُحِبَّ لأَخِيهِ مَا يُحِبُّ لِنَفْسِهِ
transliteration: Laa yu’minu ahadukum hatta yuhibba li akhihi ma yuhibbu li nafsihi
translation: None of you truly believes until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself.

title: Hadith 21: The Importance of Good Character
arabic: إِنَّ الْمُؤْمِنَ لَيُدْرِكُ بِحُسْنِ خُلُقِهِ دَرَجَةَ الصَّائِمِ الْقَائِمِ
transliteration: Innal mu’min la yudriku bi husni khuluqihi darajata as-sa’imi al-qa’imi
translation: By his good character, a believer will attain the degree of one who prays at night and fasts during the day.

title: Hadith 22: The Importance of Good Manners
arabic: أَكْمَلُ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ إِيمَانًا أَحْسَنُهُمْ خُلُقًا
transliteration: Akmalul mu’minina imanan ahsanuhum khulqan
translation: The most complete of the believers in faith are those with the best character.

title: Hadith 23: The Importance of Good Character
arabic: إِنَّ مِنْ أَحَبِّكُمْ إِلَيَّ وَأَقْرَبِكُمْ مِنِّي مَجْلِسًا يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ أَحْسَنُكُمْ أَخْلاَقًا
transliteration: Inna min ahabbikum ilayya wa aqrabikum minni majlisan yawmal qiyamati ahsanukum akhlaqan
translation: The most beloved of you to me and the closest of you to me on the Day of Judgment are those with the best character.
